meanings.definition: A type of plant that produces sticky resin
meanings.sent1: The tarweeds in the garden have a strong smell.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use tarweeds to make natural remedies.
meanings.sent3: The bees got stuck in the tarweeds and had to be rescued.
meanings.sent4: The tarweeds stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The children avoided the tarweeds, knowing they were sticky and tricky.

meanings.definition: Plants of the genus Madia, native to western North America
meanings.sent1: The tarweeds bloomed beautifully in the spring.
meanings.sent2: Hikers often encounter tarweeds along the trails.
meanings.sent3: The tarweeds whispered secrets to the passing breeze.
meanings.sent4: The fields were painted yellow by the vast tarweeds.
meanings.sent5: The tarweeds danced in the wind, a golden spectacle.
